description: TEHRAN- Israel’s savage attacks on residential areas in the Lebanese capital and the assassination of Hezbollah Secretary General Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah have once again exposed the true colors of the apartheid regime and its main supporter, the United States.
title: Israel started war, resistance will seal its fate

description: TEHRAN - For decades Israel was considered the unrivalled military power in the West Asia region. However, that concept has eroded.
title: US-supplied jets are Israel’s only superiority

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi has vocally condemned the recent lethal assaults by the Israeli regime on Beirut, while also criticizing the United States for its complicity in these actions.
title: U.S. complicit in Israeli war crimes in Lebanon: Iran FM

description: TEHRAN- The deputy head of legal and international affairs of the Iranian Foreign Ministry has called on the UN Security Council to implement effective sanctions against the Israeli regime following Chapter VII of the United Nations Charter.
title: Iran calls on UNSC to impose sanctions against Israel's crimes

description: TEHRAN- The deputy head of legal and international affairs of the Iranian Foreign Ministry has called on the UN Security Council to implement effective sanctions against the Israeli regime following Chapter VII of the United Nations Charter.
title: Israel must be sanctioned, Iranian diplomat tells UNSC

description: TEHRAN – The foreign ministers of Iran, Russia, and Turkey have united to discuss the ongoing crisis in Syria.
title: Iran, Russia, and Turkey hold Syria talks on sidelines of UN meeting

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi participated in a crucial meeting with high-ranking officials from Russia, China, and Pakistan in New York, where they addressed the pressing situation in Afghanistan.
title: Araqchi urges accountability, cooperation in Afghanistan during UN meeting

description: TEHRAN - Hezbollah is not just an organization that was founded in 1982. It is an idea and an ideology built on the foundation of serving the Lebanese nation.
title: Hezbollah is indefatigable

description: TEHRAN – Several Iranian officials have issued messages after Hezbollah Secretary-General Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah was assassinated in massive Israeli airstrikes on residential buildings in Beirut’s densely populated southern suburb of Dahiyeh on Friday.
title: Iranian officials say resistance will continue in reaction to Nasrallah’s martyrdom

description: One of Hezbollah's most striking and, at the same time, least theorized practices is the martyrdom of some of its members. Most analyses focus on a material perspective, overlooking the potential political dimensions of this practice. At the same time, these analyses are based on an absolute distinction between politics and violence, driven more by ideological assumptions than by descriptive accuracy.
title: Resistance is primarily existential battle for Hezbollah

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi has urgently called for an extraordinary meeting of the leaders of Islamic countries in response to the ongoing crimes committed by the Zionist regime in Palestine and Lebanon.
title: Tehran calls for emergency OIC meeting to address Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN – Deputy of Operations for the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) Brigadier General Abbas Nilforooshan, was assassinated during heavy Israeli attacks against a number of residential buildings in southern Beirut, which also killed Hezbollah Secretary-General Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah on Friday.
title: Senior IRGC commander martyred alongside Nasrallah in Israeli attack

description: TEHRAN – A wave of grief and anger swept through Iran, as citizens in Tehran and other major cities rallied to honor Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah and denounce the Israeli airstrike that claimed his life.
title: Iran mourns Nasrallah with nationwide rallies

description: TEHRAN – In a message published on Saturday, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei announced five days of mourning over the martyrdom of Hezbollah Secretary-General Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah, while stating that Resistance forces will be dealing heavier blows to the Zionist regime in the future.
title: Resistance will deal more crushing blows to Israel: Leader

description: TEHRAN - In a commentary, Kayhan dealt with the Economist's report.
title: Iran-China-Russia strategic interaction is frightening to US

description: TEHRAN- Spain's ambassador to Iran has emphasized the importance of enhancing collaboration between Iran and Spain's think tanks.
title: Tehran, Madrid hold talks to strengthen think tank collaborations

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman has asserted that the scenarios devised by the United States against Iran will not deter the nation from its commitment to hold accountable those responsible for crimes against the Iranian populace.
title: Iran vows to pursue justice for crimes against people: Foreign Ministry

description: TEHRAN-The 25th Nairobi International Book Fair is underway in the capital of Kenya with Iran presenting more than 300 titles.
title: Iran displaying over 300 titles in Nairobi International Book Fair

description: TEHRAN- British-Irish playwright Martin McDonagh’s black comedy play “The Lieutenant of Inishmore” is currently on stage at Tehran’s Divar Art Center.
title: “The Lieutenant of Inishmore” on stage in Tehran theater

description: TEHRAN- Three Iranian films will go on screen in different sections of 37th edition of Tokyo International Film Festival, which will be held in the Japanese capital from October 28 to November 6.
title: Tokyo film festival picks Iranian movies
Exclusive: Terror site of Seyed Hassan Nasrallah

description: TEHRAN – Work has commenced to restore and strengthen Mohammadieh Fortress, which once served as a defensive refuge in the heart of Iran during ancient times.
title: Ruins of defensive fortress in central Iran undergo restoration

description: TEHRAN - Iran is set to construct a gigantic tourism complex in Sistan-Baluchestan province, southeast of the country near the Sea of Oman.
title: Iran to construct gigantic tourism complex near Sea of Oman

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Minister of Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts, Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri, has met with UN Tourism Secretary-General Zurab Pololikashvili.
title: Iranian minister, UN Tourism chief discuss mutual cooperation

description: TEHRAN-Seyyed Ammar Hakim, the leader of Iraq's National Wisdom Movement, expressed his condolences on the martyrdom of Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah, the Secretary General of Lebanon's Hezbollah.
title: Hakim: Path of Resistance Will Continue Until Victory is Achieved

description: TEHRAN –According to the 2024 edition of the Global Innovation Index (GII) report, the Islamic Republic of Iran ranks second among the countries of the Central and Southern Asian region, unchanged compared with the last two years.
title: Iran secures position in GII for second consecutive year

description: TRHRAN –Iran has called for developing cooperation in nanotechnology as well as biotechnology with BRICS member states.
title: Tehran invites BRICS to foster co-op in nano-tech, bio-tech

description: TEHRAN –Students of Sharif University of Technology are ranked first among West Asian countries at the 14th International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC).
title: Iranian students top West Asia at ICPC 2024

description: TEHRAN- During a press conference held between the Energy Committee of Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA) and Iran Renewable Energy Association, the issues related to the renewable energy sector were discussed.
title: Renewable energy issues discussed in ICCIMA press conference

description: TEHRAN- An Iran-Oman business forum will be held in Muscat and Batinah North of Oman on October 15 and 16, the deputy head of Tehran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (TCCIMA) for the international affairs announced.
title: Muscat to host Iran-Oman business forum in mid-October

description: TEHRAN- Lebanese Hezbollah Secretary General Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah has been declared martyred in the Israeli massive air strikes on the southern suburbs of Beirut on Friday night.
title: Hezbollah leader Nasrallah martyred in Israeli air strikes
Exclusive: Israeli drones attack Beirut

description: TEHRAN - The value of the trade exchanges between Iran and the other 56 members of the Organization of Islamic Conference (OIC) reached $32.2 billion in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), registering a 14 percent increase compared to the same period a year earlier, the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) announced.
title: Iran’s trade with OIC member states rises 14%

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei has slammed Israel’s Friday attacks on Lebanese soil, which razed entire building blocks in Beirut’s southern suburb of Dahiyeh.
title: Hezbollah will make Israel regret its aggression: Leader

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Energy Minister Abbas Ali-Abadi and South African Minister of Mineral Resources and Energy Samson Gwede Mantashe emphasized the expansion of energy cooperation between the two countries.
title: Iran, South Africa stress expansion of energy cooperation

description: Saudi Arabia has formed a global alliance to push for a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, the country’s Foreign Minister, Prince Faisal Bin Farhan Al Saud, said on Thursday on the sidelines of the United Nations General Assembly meeting in New York, Reuters reports.
title: Saudi Arabia forms global alliance to push for Palestinian state

description: TEHRAN- The value of Iran’s steel products export stood at $2.9 billion in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-Septemebr 22), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Iran’s steel products export stands at $2.9b in H1

description: TEHRAN- The value of Iran’s steel products export stood at $2.9 billion in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-Septemebr 22), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Steel products export stands at $2.9b in H1

description: TEHRAN - The project manager of the Iranian Agriculture Ministry's modern irrigation systems development program has said over 100 smart irrigation pilot projects have been implemented across the country, IRIB reported.
title: Over 100 smart irrigation pilot projects implemented in Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Saipa Club took the 7th place of the 2024 Asian Women’s Club Volleyball Championship after winning 3-0 (25-20, 25-20, 25-17) against Hong Kong Kwai Tsing on Saturday afternoon at Chartchai Hall.
title: Saipa come 7th in 2024 Asian Women’s Club Volleyball Championship

description: TEHRAN – 10-man tractor edged past Sepahan 1-0 in Matchweek 6 of 2024/25 Iran’s Persian Gulf Professional League (PGPL).
title: 10-man Tractor edge past Sepahan: PGPL

description: TEHRAN - On Thursday, September 26, 2024, in a commentary in The Australian newspaper, Amir Maimon, the so-called ambassador of the illegitimate Israeli regime to Australia, raised some baseless allegations and accusations against Iran which the embassy finds necessary to make the following clarifications on them.
title: Iranian embassy dismisses accusations of Israeli ambassador to Australia

description: On Thursday, September 26, 2024, in a commentary that appeared in The Australian Newspaper, Amir Maimon, the so-called Ambassador of the illegitimate regime of ‘occupying Palestine' to Australia raised some baseless allegations and accusations against the Islamic Republic of Iran which the embassy finds necessary to make following clarifications on them:
title: Statement of Iranian embassy on accusations of Israeli regime’s ambassador to Australia

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Aragchi who is New York to attend the annual UN conference said on Friday that Israel has committed "war crimes and crimes against humanity" by launching a heavy air raid on southern Lebanese capital Beirut, noting this shows that this regime is the biggest threat to regional and international peace.
title: Iran FM Israel committing 'crimes against humanity' in Lebanon

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Aragchi who is New York to attend the annual UN conference said on Friday that Israel has committed "war crimes and crimes against humanity" by launching a heavy air raid on southern Lebanese capital Beirut, noting this shows that this regime is the biggest threat to regional and international peace.
title: Iran FM says Israel committing 'crimes against humanity'

description: A new wave of Israeli airstrikes have reportedly hit the Dahiyeh area in the south of Lebanon’s capital Beirut, which had come under deadly aerial attacks by the regime just hours earlier.
title: New wave of Israeli airstrikes hit Beirut hours after deadly raids
